tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    traffic_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_metadata (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_model VARCHAR(255),
    install_location VARCHAR(255),
    last_calibration DATE
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficSensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_location TEXT,
  sensor_type TEXT,
  traffic_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SensorStatus (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  status_code INT,
  status_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_sensors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_errors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    error_message VARCHAR(200),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_aggregated_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    avg_value FLOAT,
    min_value FLOAT,
    max_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
